#summary Notes on installation of XMLCalabash

= XML Calabash installation =

As per http://xmlcalabash.com/docs/

Download calabash distro from http://xmlcalabash.com/download/calabash-0.9.32.zip
unzipped to /ands/calabash

Wrote shell script {{{/ands/calabash/calabash.sh}}} to launch calabash:

{{{
#!/bin/sh
java -Xmx1024m -cp /ands/calabash/calabash.jar:/ands/calabash/lib/commons-codec-1.3.jar:/ands/calabash/lib/commons-logging-1.1.1.jar:/ands/calabash/lib/commons-httpclient-3.1.jar:/ands/calabash/lib/saxon9he.jar com.xmlcalabash.drivers.Main $*
}}}
